data.eml:eml: New species and new record of Cerambycidae (Coleoptera) from Mexico, with updates to type depository for two species of Disteniinae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heffern, Daniel, Santos-Silva, Antonio (2016): New species and new record of Cerambycidae (Coleoptera) from Mexico, with updates to type depository for two species of Disteniinae. Zootaxa 4072 (5): 569-578, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.5.4
